actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to redefine the period of war known as the Mexican border period in order to extend veterans' benefits to persons who served in Mexico on or after June 1, 1914.

summary.text: Redefines the period of war known as the Mexican border period in order to extend veterans' benefits to persons who served in Mexico on or after June 1, 1914.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to redefine the period of war known as the Mexican border period in order to extend veterans' benefits to persons who served in Mexico on or after June 1, 1914.
